electricityContract.terms: Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. All times are AEST, unless you have an interval meter, in which case daylight savings time will apply. We will issue your bill at least quarterly, or if you have a Smart Meter, monthly, unless you have requested to be billed quarterly or your Smart Meter does not have active telecommunications.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: Red will contribute $5 to Taronga Conservation Society Australia for each calendar month you are on the Red Wildlife Saver plan, starting from the date we become responsible for your electricity supply
For every unit of electricity you buy from Red Energy, Snowy Hydro Limited will match it by generating one unit of electricity from a renewable source

eligibility.information: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Citipower distribution zone with applicable network tariff. To take up this offer or for more information you will need to phone Red Energy on 131 806 or visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/products

singleRate.description: Generally apply for 7 hours a day and the times are managed by your network (Hot water and/or slab heating only).

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
